name: Application and license fees
text:
(a)  Each application shall be accompanied by:
     (1)  A non-refundable application fee in the amount of $1,000 plus $100 for each additional location in the State, not to exceed a maximum fee of $4,000; and 
     (2)  A license fee of $500 plus $100 for each additional location in the State, not to exceed a maximum fee of $2,000.
     (b)  The license fee shall be refunded if the application is denied. [L 2006, c 153, pt of §1]
